purpose: Facilitates web scraping and data collection by offering rotating residential proxies to bypass IP bans and rate limits.
principle: Utilizes a large pool of residential IP addresses to rotate requests, ensuring anonymity and access to data without being blocked.
reusability: Can be integrated into web scraping tools and applications via simple configuration, supports both HTTP(S) and SOCKS5 protocols.
limitations: May have limitations on the number of requests per second and the geographic distribution of available IPs.
name: Decodo
description: HTTP(S)/SOCKS5 rotating residential proxies - code examples & general information.
highlight: Provides a robust solution for rotating residential proxies with support for HTTP(S) and SOCKS5 protocols.
